channel.title: Opening a saved project on JIPipe for ImageJ
channel.description: Recent content in Opening a saved project on JIPipe for ImageJ

item.title: Step 1
item.description: From the Project menu, select Recent projects, and choose one of the preexisting JIPipe file (red arrow 1 and red arrow 2). If you have no recent projects, you can also navigate to Project > Open and select the *.jip file.

item.title: Step 2
item.description: Choose to open the existing project either in the current window, or in a new window.

item.title: Step 3
item.description: Now the saved project will reopen, showing the compartment structure(s). JIPipe will always attempt to restore the UI configuration (tabs etc.) that was present during the saving of the project.
